Package org.apache.avro.generic

A generic representation for Avro data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GenericArray<T> An array of objects.
GenericContainer Contains data of other types.
GenericFixed Fixed-size data.
GenericRecord A set of fields, each a name/value pair.
 

Class Summary
GenericData Utilities for generic Java data.
GenericData.Array<T> Default implementation of GenericArray.
GenericData.Fixed Default implementation of GenericFixed.
GenericData.Record Default implementation of GenericRecord.
GenericDatumReader<D> DatumReader for generic Java objects.
GenericDatumWriter<D> DatumWriter for generic Java objects.
GenericRequestor Requestor implementation for generic Java data.
GenericResponder Responder implementation for generic Java data.
 

Package org.apache.avro.generic Description

A generic representation for Avro data. Represent Schema data with generic Java classes.

Uses the following mapping:

  • Schema records are implemented as GenericRecord.
  • Schema enums are implemented as String.
  • Schema arrays are implemented as GenericArray.
  • Schema maps are implemented as Map.
  • Schema fixed are implemented as GenericFixed.
  • Schema strings are implemented as Utf8.
  • Schema bytes are implemented as ByteBuffer.
  • Schema ints are implemented as Integer.
  • Schema longs are implemented as Long.
  • Schema floats are implemented as Float.
  • Schema doubles are implemented as Double.
  • Schema booleans are implemented as Boolean.
